name: K-One Shot
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND HAS BEEN SPLIT INTO MULTIPLE "WAVES". 

WAVES ARE LIKE CHAPTERS, EACH WAVE WILL CONTAIN A MAXIMUM OF 3 SONGS ADDED TO THE GAME.

K-One Shot is a K-Pop themed dance game similar to Just Dance.

The game plays as follow :

You start the song with 3 lives and a restart button, if you decide to restart a song, you'll lose a life. The goal of the game is to finish dancing to the song without restarting it once.

Made with Godot 3.3.4
